com.inmobi.messaging.publisher

Interface MessagePublisher

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMessagePublisher, ConsolePublisher, FlumeMessagePublisher, ScribeMessagePublisher

    public interface MessagePublisher
    Publishes message to the configured concrete MessagePublisher.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes and cleans up any connections, file handles etc.
      void publish(String topicName, Message m)
      Publishes the message onto the configured concrete MessagePublisher.

    • Method Detail

      • publish

        void publish(String topicName,
           Message m)
        Publishes the message onto the configured concrete MessagePublisher. This method should return very fast and do most of its processing asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        topicName - The topic on which message should be published
        m - The Message object to be published

      • close

        void close()
        Closes and cleans up any connections, file handles etc.
